TokenMakerMaker

Note: This documentation is currently incomplete!

TokenMakerMaker is a utility to help you create TokenMakers so you can add syntax highlighting for new languages in RSyntaxTextArea. If you want to add support for a DSL or other language not natively supported by RSTA, and the language structure is similar to many of the popular languages of today such as Java, C++, or Perl, then TokenMakerMaker can be a valuable tool.

Select specific documentation to the left. Alternatively, all dialogs and panels in TokenMakerMaker have links directly to help pages about them.

For feedback or questions not answered here, feel free to use the RSyntaxTextArea forums.
